text: 11.10: VB 12.12; 13.8; 16.10Kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi, mani rimgi ne suaŋv mani khumani ganɨv ndikndigɨrga. Mbe ndikndigɨp ŋgavir muuŋv, bigir vhuuin fhura wari won kɨvntogir nɨɨnga. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mba Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumani, mani zaa mbatɨgar kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ga nɨɨŋgi.
